# Metju.Chord - React TypeScript Project

## Project Overview

Pure React TypeScript application built with Webpack (no frameworks like Vite or Create React App).

## Development Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for all components and modules
- Follow React best practices and hooks patterns
- Use functional components over class components
- Maintain proper type safety throughout the codebase
- Follow the existing Webpack configuration for builds

## Tech Stack

- React 19 with TypeScript 5
- Webpack 5 for bundling
- ts-loader for TypeScript compilation
- CSS with style-loader and css-loader

## Available Commands

- `npm start` - Start development server on port 3000
- `npm run build` - Create production build in dist/ folder

## Project Status

- [x] Project scaffolded with custom Webpack setup
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] TypeScript configuration complete
- [x] Ready for development
